article.title: Rockwell to Provide Swe-Dish CCT-120 Satellite Terminals
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins, Satellite Communication, Duluth, Georgia, was recently awarded a contract modification valued at more than $5 million for 43 Swe-Dish CCT-120 satellite terminals. U.S. Air ForceÂ 6th Contracting Squadron, MacDill Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
